channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 加拿大总理贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）认为唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）可能重返加拿大，在此之前，加拿大正在重启一个官方论坛，以理顺与美国每天 34 亿加元（约合 25 亿美元）的贸易关系。
item.description:
Canada is rebooting an official forum to smooth its C$3.4-billion-a-day ($2.5 billion) trading relationship with the US ahead of the “unpredictability” Prime Minister Justin Trudeau sees with a potential return of Donald Trump. https://t.co/aWsTiprNco

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 高盛混合资本美洲联席主管李-贝克尔（Lee Becker）是该行资产和财富管理部门离职人员中的一员
item.description:
Goldman's hybrid capital Americas co-head Lee Becker adds to the departures from the bank's asset- and wealth-management arm https://t.co/6AhRac2aiX

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 乔-拜登（Joe Biden）和唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在获得各自党派的提名后，将展开近期记忆中最漫长、最丑陋的政治角逐。
item.description:
Having clinched their respective parties’ nominations, Joe Biden and Donald Trump are embarking on what is poised to be the longest — and one of the ugliest — political contests in recent memory https://t.co/sjqaEsxfgK

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）表示，市场利率 "不太可能 "恢复到 19 世纪科维德大流行引发通胀浪潮和收益率上升之前的水平。
item.description:
US Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said it’s “unlikely” that market interest rates will return to levels that prevailed before the Covid-19 pandemic triggered a wave of inflation and higher yields. https://t.co/RblTpiW1gk

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 由于供应过剩有减弱的迹象，针对 Albemarle 和 Pilbara Minerals 等全球最大锂生产商的价值数十亿美元的空头押注正受到威胁。
item.description:
Short bets worth billions against some of the world’s largest lithium producers like Albemarle and Pilbara Minerals are under threat as a supply glut shows signs of thinning https://t.co/t4K4wqBa6h

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会可以继续提起诉讼，指控双子座和破产的加密货币贷款机构 Genesis 通过其支付利息的双子座盈产品非法发售未经注册的证券。
item.description:
The SEC can proceed with its suit accusing Gemini and bankrupt cryptocurrency lender Genesis of illegally offering unregistered securities through their interest-paying Gemini Earn product. https://t.co/MfORejcKjm

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: -特斯拉-德克萨斯路屋-TriPointe @RomaineBostick有今天的热门电话
item.description:
-Tesla
-Texas Roadhouse
-TriPointe @RomaineBostick has today's top calls https://t.co/BEQ1nzamry pic.twitter.com/s0vKnzIEEW

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 数字资产市场上的memecoin狂潮没有停止的迹象，目前的交易量达到了两年多前上一次加密货币泡沫破灭前的水平。
item.description:
The memecoin frenzy in the digital-asset market shows no signs of stopping, with trading volumes now at levels last seen just before the burst of the last crypto bubble more than two years ago https://t.co/LRTGGMrBZA

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 康明斯公司（Cummins Inc.）计划在首次公开募股（IPO）中分拆出 Atmus 过滤技术公司约一年后分配其剩余股权，这为交易商蜂拥参与 15 亿美元的交换要约敞开了大门。
item.description:
Cummins Inc. plans to distribute its remaining stakes in Atmus Filtration Technologies about a year after carving out the unit in an IPO, opening the door for traders to swarm the $1.5 billion exchange offer. https://t.co/oLIj5n7IBS

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 据报道，美国总统拜登计划对日本新日铁的收购计划表示担忧，导致美国钢铁股价暴跌，周三早盘抢购看跌美国钢铁期权的交易商有望获利超过10倍。
item.description:
Traders who snapped up bearish US Steel options early on Wednesday stand to make more than 10 times their money after the stock plunged following a report that President Biden plans to express concerns about a proposed takeover by Japan’s Nippon. https://t.co/zmDh3iTvkM

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 巴西国有石油公司（Petrobras）股价暴跌，单个交易日价值缩水约 110 亿美元，这帮助提高了里约热内卢一家对冲基金经理的回报率
item.description:
The plunge in shares of Brazilian state-owned oil company Petrobras that erased about $11 billion in value in a single session helped boost returns at a Rio de Janeiro-based hedge fund manager https://t.co/hRBdrTfvsX

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 美联储研究人员称，国债基础交易这一债券市场策略引起了监管机构的密切关注，其资金量可能只有通常估计的三分之一。
item.description:
Federal Reserve researchers say the amount of money in the Treasury basis trade, a bond-market strategy that has drawn the scrutiny of regulators, could be as little as a third of commonly used estimates. https://t.co/mJVDAiB1ja

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 澳大利亚正努力应对日益加深的住房危机。然而，在最显而易见的解决方案面前，城市居民似乎就是不愿长大。
item.description:
Australia is grappling with a deepening housing crisis. Yet when it comes to the most obvious solution it seems its city dwellers just don’t want to grow up. https://t.co/PWrJRKqDUV

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 哈佛大学经济学教授肯尼斯-罗格夫（Kenneth Rogoff）说，乔-拜登总统和他的前任兼挑战者唐纳德-特朗普都有可能将美国的债务水平推向危险境地。
item.description:
Harvard University economics professor Kenneth Rogoff said both President Joe Biden and his predecessor and challenger Donald Trump risk sending US debt levels into dangerous territory. https://t.co/rYNne6TZgn

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 美国卫生部门正在调查 UnitedHealth 的 Change Healthcare 部门受到的网络攻击是否涉及个人健康信息泄露。
item.description:
US health authorities are investigating whether the cyberattack on UnitedHealth’s Change Healthcare unit involved a breach of personal health information. https://t.co/vZDf8XqkbE

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）表示，她预计住房成本上涨幅度的减缓将有助于在 2024 年降低通货膨胀率。
item.description:
Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said she expects a moderation in the rise of housing costs will help deliver lower inflation in 2024. https://t.co/Y2pRfhbKcl

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 消息人士称，英国计划禁止外国控股或影响当地媒体公司，因为部长们正在考虑与阿联酋有关联的《每日电讯报》收购案
item.description:
The UK plans to ban foreign states from taking controlling stakes or influencing local media companies, sources say, as ministers consider a UAE-linked takeover of the Telegraph newspaper https://t.co/hwBgksOECX

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 华尔街行业组织警告说，纽约州全面改革主权债务重组程序的努力将对发展中经济体产生意想不到的后果。
item.description:
Wall Street industry groups are warning that a New York state effort to overhaul the process of restructuring sovereign debt would have unintended consequences for developing economies. https://t.co/rM7ibuC7gd

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 摩科瑞能源公司（Mercuria Energy）的首席交易员、曾经的继承人马吉德-舍努达（Magid Shenouda）即将离开公司。
item.description:
Mercuria Energy’s head trader and one-time heir apparent Magid Shenouda is leaving the company. https://t.co/saobepHFw2

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，尼日利亚已聘请包括花旗银行、摩根大通和高盛在内的投资银行为其自 2022 年以来的首次欧元债券发行提供咨询。
item.description:
Nigeria has hired investment banks including Citibank, JPMorgan Chase and Goldman Sachs to advise it on its first eurobond issue since 2022, according to people familiar with the deal. https://t.co/dxb1w6EpC1

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 消息人士称，Cerberus 正在牵头收购波兰贷款机构 VeloBank
item.description:
Cerberus is leading the race to buy Polish lender VeloBank, sources say https://t.co/1eqhdC0nPU

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 一周前，英国预算案宣布大幅减税。然而，政治新闻却在关注另一个问题：关于保守党捐赠人的种族主义争论。此外，还有英超联赛的新规则。与 @AllegraStratton 一起了解最新消息
item.description:
The UK Budget announcing big tax cuts was just a week ago. Yet political news is focused on another issue: a racism row about a Conservative donor. Plus, new rules for the Premier League. Get The Readout with @AllegraStratton https://t.co/8tIC6x3Yv2

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 在成员国达成妥协，允许从集团外采购后，欧盟初步支持向乌克兰提供 50 亿欧元的军事援助
item.description:
The EU gives initial backing to provide €5 billion in military support for Ukraine, after member states reached a compromise to allow purchases from outside the bloc https://t.co/CpsReQGIq7

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 在创始人史蒂夫-科恩（Steve Cohen）重返对冲基金行业六年之后，Point72 在过去一年中募集了约 38 亿美元，资产规模创下历史新高。
item.description:
Point72 raised roughly $3.8 billion over the past year, bringing assets to a record high, six years after founder Steve Cohen returned to the hedge fund industry https://t.co/fXdepNZ09A

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 今年迄今为止，微策略公司的股价已经上涨了两倍多，比特币飙升至历史新高，以及交易员对该公司的押注使其股价大涨。
item.description:
Shares of MicroStrategy have more than tripled so far this year, getting a boost as Bitcoin surges to all-time highs and burning traders betting against the company https://t.co/p1nC6bNs8L

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 帕迪电力公司的所有者 Flutter Entertainment 在过去一年里在股市上落后于英国博彩业的竞争对手 Entain，摩根大通的分析师认为这种情况不会很快改变。
item.description:
Paddy Power owner Flutter Entertainment has left UK betting rival Entain trailing on the stock market over the past year, and JPMorgan analysts don’t see that changing any time soon https://t.co/CZL9y1bwte

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 阿联酋和匈牙利签署了一项价值 55 亿美元的协议，将在布达佩斯的一个街区开发迪拜式的枢纽中心
item.description:
The UAE and Hungary signed a $5.5 billion deal to develop a Dubai-style hub in a Budapest neighborhood https://t.co/1OyP1ezOVh

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 美国经济在四个方面都让人有理由感到乐观。目前，预计经济增长将高于趋势水平，即使如此，美联储仍将下调利率。原因如下
item.description:
On four different fronts the US economy gives one reason to be optimistic. For the time being expect growth above trend and for the Fed to cut rates even so. Here’s why. https://t.co/z2WEQOw25I

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 史蒂夫-科恩（Steve Cohen）的 Point72 资产管理公司数字资产技术主管特伦斯-肖菲尔德（Terence Schofield）最近离开了这家对冲基金。
item.description:
Terence Schofield, the head of digital assets technology at Steve Cohen’s Point72 Asset Management, recently left the hedge fund. https://t.co/xTpvipBCZN

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 据联合国称，一项衡量人们生活水平和寿命的指标提供了新的证据，表明富国和穷国之间的差距越来越大
item.description:
A measure of how well and how long people live offers fresh evidence of a growing split between rich and poor countries, according to the United Nations https://t.co/lwmxLiaVrL

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024
